description: Aquilegia (Songbird Series) 'Cardinal' or Columbine is a stunning and delightful perennial. Its fragrant and vibrant flowers offer an exquisite contrast of colors. With its blooms in vivid shades of hot red and yellow and its deep-green toothed foliage, it is sure to be the highlight of any garden. The flowers are also ideal for cutting, allowing you to bring its beauty indoors. This plant is deer resistant, frost tolerant and the perfect pollinator haven. It is easy to grow, tolerates a range of soil types and is an excellent choice to add long-lasting color and beauty to your garden.
